name: 鄭鈺潔
objective: Liquid crystal material and their polymerization characteristics 2.liquid crystal soft actuators  3. development and application of the soft actuators
schedule:
Week1-2 How does the LC change the polarization of light?  
Week 3-4 The analysis of the LC phase using POM+phase retarder  
Week 5-6 The introduction of LCE and LCN 
Week 7-8 The introduction of photoaligned CLC 
Week 9-10 The surface treatment for LC 
Week 11-12The working principle of two-photon absorption
Week 13-15 applications of soft actuators based on liquid crystal networks 
Week 16-17 oral presentation
